https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/NQch1dpkB7zpYiCBInRALI75nD.jpg Winter in Anatolia. An aged refugee, on his way home with his granddaughter, drags a coffin with his wife's body. But crossing borders is not easy. A serene road movie conveying the desire for peace. Cloves & Carnations
